name: Consecrated Horned Crocodile
title: Remnant Tide: Consecrated Horned Crocodile
desc: A reptile that has mutated after feeding from greater lifeforms, controlling the ever-changing flow of water.

attributes.source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with the Consecrated Horned Crocodile

skills.name: Saw-Toothed Surge
skills.desc: Deals ? ?, puts up to 1 card with the highest original Elemental Dice cost in your Hand at the bottom of your deck, then creates 1 Bonecruncher's Energy Block and adds it to your Hand.

skills.name: Reptilian Rage
skills.desc: Deals ? ?, then Discards up to 3 Bonecruncher's Energy Block cards. For each of those cards Discarded, heal the character on your team that has taken the most damage for 1 HP and increase their Max HP by 1.

skills.name: Consecrated Senses
skills.desc: (Passive) After you play or discard a Bonecruncher's Energy Block card, heal the character on your team that has taken the most damage for 1 HP.
